1.content:
One day, while team Chaotix was relaxing at home. Something strange occured.

"Say,Espio could you turn out the lights, I'm trying to sleep." said Vector.

"I would if I had the lights on, which I don't." said Espio.

"Huh? then what's making all the-whoa!" said Vector as he fell out of his chair.

"okay, I back from the- what's that?" Charmy said in a paniky voice.

The three of them could not believe what they were seeing, a portal in there home. While they were looking, Vector noticed something on the floor as did Charmy.

"A quarter!" they both said in unison. then they glared at each other an said,"Its mine!"

Then a fight started over the quarter which was acidently kicked into the portal.

"Your not getting away from me that easily." said Vector as he jumped in after it.

"I wanna come too." Charmy whined as he flew in after.

Espio sighed and said,"I better go in after them." He jumped in after them unknowing ly that a certain scientist was watching the whole thing.

"Interesting, a portal that leads to another world, what fun." he turned to his robots and said,"Go after them and claim that world for me,even though I will be coming along."

First, the scientist(Dr.Eggman) walked through the portal with his creation,Metal Sonic. After he entered, one by one the robots followed under his command.

What form of media did Team Chaotix crossover to?
1.title: The adventure begins

115332212.title: KH1-KHDDD

1153322121.content:
"Hey, I can see the lights from down there! Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh!"

Unknowingly, Team Chaotix is falling into Traverse Town, a place for people who lost their homes.

"GAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH! Ouch! Ooooooooooooooh."

Then Charmy fell on Vector. "Oof!"

Espio appears to land on the brick ground just fine.

"Well, glad that's over. But what is this place?"

"I don't know, Vector. But one thing's for sure. We have stumbled into a very strange place. Speaking of which, I think Sonic said that in... Well, never mind."

"Wait a second. Is that..."
1153322121.title: Kingdom Hearts 1

choices: They got kicked out by Cid.
They didn't get kicked out, but don't look like customers.
11533221211.content:
Vector was surprised to see Sora running away from the Heartless toward them. "Sora!"

"Hey Sora!"

"Hi, say, you're not Heartless, are you?"

"Nope, we're Team Chaotix. I'm Charmy."

"I'm Espio, and this is Vector."

"Hi."

"I'm Sora."

Unfortunately, the Heartless are heading toward Sora and Team Chaotix. "Quick, no time to explain!"

They hurried toward Cid's Shop, and got inside it.

What happens next?
11533221211.title: Sora

choices: Take care of the Heartless for them
115332212112.content: What does Cid do to Sora and Team Chaotix?

125.title: more

1251.content:
"GAAAAAAHHHHHHH! Oof! Glad that's over."

Then charmy fell on top.

Then Espio landed.

"Where are we?"

"Don't know, Carmy. But we can investigate. Espio, you go to that factory, Charmy, the sewers, and I'll go to that snobby looking boarding school."

"Break!"

They then parted.

Vector then began investigating the school.

"Looks pretty boring."

Then he heard some music.

"That is a kicking beat. It's coming from that gymnasium."

He opened the doors to see the music was coming from
1251.title: code lyoko

choices: the diary of a crazed family

13.content: There are so many possibilities for the human world. Also, how would this world react to a talking crocodile, bee, and chameleon? Could this portal turn them into their human counterparts or something completely different? Let's find out....
13.title: human world

132.content:
The three then found themselves in an alley of a large city.

"Ugh, what a rush. I'm never doing that again." Vector said as he got up. He then noticed something strange about his team.

"What's wrong, Vector?" Charmy asked.

"You guys, we are human!" Vector said.

What Vector had said was true, they had become human. Charmy was now a small child who still had his helmet and vest but was left wingless and stinger less. Espio took on the appearance of a teenager wearing purple clothing, but still had all of his ninja weapons. Vector took on the appearance of a young man. He wore a green leather jacket and leather pants. He had his signature headphones around his neck to complete the whole look.

"At least I still got to keep my headphones. Now what are we going to do now?"

It was decided among the group to
132.title: The arrive as humans.

choices: The three look for the portal.
1321.content:
Vector took the lead, looking about for any dangers then walked out onto the main sidewalk with Charmy following and Espio taking the rear. "It looks like we've stumbled into a city filled with humans." quietly, Vector said. "I wonder if they use the same money we do back at home."

"Is that all you can think of is money?" sighing, Espio asked.

"It's what pays the bills." shrugging, Vector replied. "Also, there is no harm in trying to get rich."

The people on the side walk never threw them more than a curious glance as they passed, making them feel almost welcome in this strange new world. "This may be a good place to go on vacation." smiling, Charmy said. "I bet there are a lot of fun things to do here."

"Maybe." spotting a Karate school, Espio said. "We'll talk about that later."

Then, a piercing alarm was heard and the tree turned to see two armed men backing out of a bank. One of them was holding a young girl as a hostage as he waved his gun around. "No one follows us or the girl gets it!" threatening, the man yelled into the bank. "We'll drop her off a few miles down the road, if we are not followed!"

Espio growled under his breath and cast a throwing star at the man's hand. It hit its target and the man howled in pain, dropping his gun only to find Espio on him in the next breath with a kick to his face.

"I guess we better help." sighing, Vector said.

"Right behind you, Vector." Charmy said.

Out of habit alone, Charmy tried to fly and, to his surprise, he flew through the air and punched the second man in the jaw as he was leveling his own gun at Espio. Vector, hoping to have some fun, saw a man jump out of a car with a gun of his own and guessed he was the get away driver. He stepped into his path and knocked the gun out of his hand with one blow before easily lifting the car! This was a surprise to Vector but he was loving the frightened look on ther would be bank robber.

"Not today, mate!" flipping the car upside down, he said. "I suggest you give up now."

The man shook his head, stunned and frightened, before running away from Vector but he did not get to far as Vector grabbed him from behind and threw him into the man Charmy was fighting with before Espio landed a blow to the first man, sending him to the ground, unconscious.

"It looks like we still have everything." smiling, Charmy said.

Espio nodded. "Just in a different form."

Then a number of police cars were heard approaching and the three ran from the scene, leaving a shaken but grateful girl who called out, "Please, wait!"

Charmy paused and flew back. "What's up?" he asked.

The girl gave Charmy a small wad of bills. "For saving my life." smiling, she said.

"All in a days work, ma'am." blushing, Charmy said.

He then flew back to the group, beaming. "It pays to help others here, I guess."

Vector took the wad of bills from Charmy and smiled. "I like it here already!"

"We should still try to find a way back to where we belong." serious, Espio said.
1321.title: Unknown heroes.

13212.content:
"We have plenty of time for that. I say we try and milk the cow." Vector said with a grin on his face.

"I don't see any cows." Charmy said.

"No, you idiot. I'm saying we try and get as rich as we possibly can, then we head back home and live it up in the lap of luxury."

"But what do you suggest we do then?" Espio asked.

"You saw how much money that girl gave us just for saving her life. Imagine if we do that some more? We'll be millionaires. Maybe even billionaires. All we got to do is find some more crime to stop and the money will be flowing in. Its just like the Four Seasons, but instead we'll be earning the money. Heh heh heh."

"How do you suggest we find more crime?"

"Leave that to me."

Vector then snuck his way to an abandoned police car and ripped out the radio inside and ran off with it.

"I can't believe you just did that."

"Really? Because I can. Now let's find a place to plan."

The three travel around the city till they come across
13212.title: They decide to stay longer.

132122.content:
The three found an old, run down house house, just outside of town. It was fully furnished with a broke down car in the garage and enough can goods in the cellar to last a while. "This looks like the perfect location." nodding, Vector said. "No one has been here in years and those can goods look good to me."

Espio examined the cans and nodded. "They are good for another year, meaning this house was abandoned for at least one or two years ago."

"Do you think that old car still runs?" looking at Vector, Charmy asked. "It would give us a fast way to get to any crime scenes we hear about."

"I don't know." cracking his knuckles, Vector replied. "I'll see if I can get the engine to turn over."

"Need any help?" following, Charmy asked.

"You can scrounge up some tools for me, in case I need them." smiling, Vector said. "In the meantime, Espio, I think you might want to check out the rest of the house, make sure we are alone here."

Espio nodded. "Rodger."

With that, the three parted....
132122.title: a run down house

1321222.content:
Vector was busy working on the engine with Charmy handing him tool after tool.

"Just out of curiosity, how do you know how to do this?" Charmy asked.

"How do you think I save money on a mechanics? This saves me hundreds of bucks."

"But didn't all of those fall apart and explode?"

"That was due to faulty wiring. Its not my fault those cars were deathtraps?"

With one final turn of the wrench, the car started up with a roar.

"There we go. I wonder how Espio is doing? He's been gone for an hour now."

Just then, Espio walked into the garage.

"Greetings my friends. I found something that might interest all of you."

Espio then guided them through the house and into the study.

"There better be a good reason we're all in here."

"There is. Its behind this closet."

Espio then opened the doors of the closet to reveal
1321222.title: follow Vector and Charmy.

choices: Two men and a boy walked in.
13212222.content:
"A hidden stairwell." looking into the darkness, Vector said. "How mysterious."

"I'll check it out." flying in, Charmy said.

"Be careful, Charmy." serious, Espio warned.

"This is cool!" excited, Charmy said. "Hey guys, check this out!"

Lights came on and Espio hurried down with Vector following to find what could only be described as a secret lair, straight out of the comic books. There were various computer stations with dozens of screens, all watching over part of the city with three sports cars that all seemed to have been custom built for the three of them. One was child's size with a rocket engine and retractable wings for flight. The second had a conversion top that allowed the driver to jump from the vehicle with a completely automatic back up driving system. The third was an all terrain truck with armor and a battering ram.

"The truck is mine." smiling, Vector said.

"We do not know who resides here." calmly, Espio warned. "Nor do we know if there are any traps to prevent anyone from entering here."

"You watch too much television." chuckling, Vector said.

No sooner Vector said that...
13212222.title: a hidden lair

choices: one man, a woman and a boy walked in
a large computer came down from the ceiling
132122221.content:
A soon as Vector had said that, a large array of weapons lowered from the ceiling and began firing at them.

"Still think I was wring, Vector?" Espio said as he ducked down.

"You were right okay. Now can we please stop these things before we end up six feet into the ground?"

Espio then went out into the line of fire and began to dodge the artillery. As soon as he got close to the weapons, he then threw his shurikens into the barrels of the weapons, which blocked the attacks and caused them to explode.

"Nice job, Espio."

"These traps were obviously set up by hand. Someone must not want us here if they went to these lengths."

As the three got back together
132122221.title: a trap was sprung.

1321222212.content:
A large computer screen slowly lowered from the ceiling and an image of Vector, Charmy, and Espio appeared. "Cool, we're on television." sarcastically, Vector said.

"Not us, different versions of us." serious, Espio said. "Look at that version of you, he's wearing a different type of headphones than you."

Vector looked more closely and saw that the other version of himself was wearing something that looked more like some high tech device than headphones. He turned to the other version of Charmy and saw that his wings appeared to have been burned off and he was wearing some type of rocket pack to replace it with. Lastly, the other version of Espio was wearing a patch over one eye with a long scar running down half of his face.

"If you are watching this video, it means that we have fallen to the forces of evil or to the lashings of old age." with a raspy voice, 'Vector' said. "We employ you to keep up the fight and not allow Dr Robotnik or his partner Metal Sonic to take over this world."

"If they succeed here, they will move on to other worlds, other realities until they have conquered every world, included where you may have come from." equally serious, 'Espio' said. "The people of this world pay handsomely to keep their world safe as they know well the alternative."

"Please, don't let those monsters win." tearing up 'Charmy' said. "We worked so hard to save this world!"

"The choice is yours." placing a hand onto 'Charmy's' shoulder, 'Espio' said. "We can only hope you make the honorable decision."

With that, the computer screen rose back up to where it had come and all of the computers and gadgets inside the lair turned on, as if waiting for their new masters....
1321222212.title: a large computer came down from the ceiling

13212222121.content:
"That was a complete shock. I haven't been this surprised since I was ambushed by Big Louie and Small Louie." Vector said taking it all in.

"So those guys were old versions of ourselves?" Charmy asked.

"And it would seem that they no longer exist in the here and now." Espio deduced.

Vector then slammed his fist down into the ground.

"Those guys were good men. Guys, we have to honor their wish." Vector said as he teared up.

He then stood up tall and strong.

"That mustached moron is going to pay for doing this!" Vector shouted.

"Yeah!" Charmy shouted.

"I concur. From this day forward. We will defend this world till we can find our way home. Here, we are Team Chaotix!" Espio concluded.

And that was the beginning of their superhero career.
13212222121.title: Reactions...

132122221211.content:
"The first order of business is to see if there was any unfinished business left for us to handle." looking at what he guessed was the main control panel. "If we get an idea of their last mission, we may be able to give them some payback."

"It wouldn't hurt to see if the old team had any allies we can contact." looking over another control panel, Charmy said. "Maybe we can find other heroes in this town to help us."

"I'll start making an inventory of everything we have so we know better where we stand." grabbing a pen and clipboard, Espio said.

"Do you need any help?" offering, Charmy asked.

Espio shook his head. "I need you to cross reference every name you find with the old team's case files to see if any of them may me a mole or a spy." serious, he replied. "It's possible that someone they considered an ally turned out to be an enemy, we must be careful."

"Rodger that." focusing on his task, Charmy said. "Also, I think we'll need different names so that 'Robutnik' and his pal, 'Rust Sonic' don't get wind of who we really are."

Vector laughed. "Rust Sonic, that's a good one!"

Charmy laughed with him and returned to his task while Vector and Espio moved onto theirs.
132122221211.title: continue

1321222212112.content:
Vector then began to type into the computer to enter the data base, till they came across a problem.

"Uh-oh! It looks like we need a password to go through. Dang it. Why didn't they leave those behind on a piece of paper?"

"Your other self probably cheaped out on paper to save a couple bucks."

"Shut it you-. Wait a minute! If my self set the password, I just have to think about stuff I like."

Vector then began to type a word, but the computer gave a buzzer.

"Dang it! Guess it isn't money."

"Let's me take a crack at it."

Charmy then typed another word in and the computer gave ding.

"No way! What did you type in?"

"Chaotix! What else?"

"It was that easy? Remind me to improve this place later. Now let's find those names."

Vector and Charmy then began their long search.
1321222212112.title: Follow Vector and Charmy.

13212222121121.content:
"Hey, Vector." hitting a key, Charmy said. "There is a human Sonic and a human Knuckles here and I guess they have a team of their own in a city just west of us."

"Mobius City." reading the file, Vector said. "It suits them." he then hit a key and smiled. "It looks like we defend Old York City."

Charmy giggled then continued reading the file he was looking at. As he did, his smile vanished and was replaced with worry. Seeing his face, Vector asked, "What's wrong, buddy?"

"Sonic and Knuckles fight some guy named Bowser." looking at the screen, Charmy replied. "He is the leader and most powerful of the turtle-like Koopa race."

"Koopa race?" scratching his head, Vector asked. "I never heard of 'em."

"Neither have I, that's what worries me." serious, Charmy said. "At first, I thought we were in a world like our own, just with the people all human like. But now, I'm not sure..."

"This Bowser likes to call himself 'King Koopa'." reading the file, Vector said. "It says here that he and his followers are notoriously greedy and is the arch nemesis of some group called Super Mario Brothers." he paused. "Hmmm. Perhaps they came from another world, just as we did as it says here his ultimate goals are to marry some Princess Peach, defeat Mario, and conquer a place called the Mushroom Kingdom."

"It's possible." wincing, Charmy said. "We ended up here, chasing a quarter that vanished the second all three of us were on the other side."

"Do you think we were lured here?" remembering the quarter, Vector asked.

"I can't say for certain but it does seem possible." turning back to the screen, Charmy said. "There are a lot of characters here I have never heard of. Some seem to be our allies while others are definitely enemies."

"We'll need a full list of who is who in this world so we can look over it carefully." serious, Vector said. "I think Espio said it best, never jump into anything blind."

"Rodger that." with a quick salute, Charmy said.

What seemed like hours later, an exhausted Charmy and Vector had a full list of allies and enemies while an equally exhausted Vector had a full report of the original group's past cases, including their last mission before losing their lives. Espio entered, also looking exhausted and sat down with the other two in a large comfortable sitting room off the main lair.

"We have a large arsenal to work with with a sizable cash flow." sitting down, Espio said. "What did you two discover in your search?"

"This world is filled with characters from all worlds." tiredly, Charm said. "It's a nightmare here."

"Apparently, this world is a in between station to other worlds." yawning, Vector said. "The original team had their hands full trying to keep this world safe from villains coming from literally everywhere."

"Someone must be opening these portals." thoughtfully, Espio said. "We find this villain and we stop the madness that the original group had to face."

"Where do we start?" worried, Charmy asked.

"With a nap." leaning back, Vector said. "We are useless to anyone as tired as we all are."

"Agreed." nodding, Espio said. "Let us find some bed chambers and start hitting these files in the morning."
13212222121121.title: continue

132122221211212.content:
After learning up about the world they were living in, they soon found that each of them had their own rooms for them to sleep in. After they each had found their own rooms, they each immediately went to sleep, well except for Espio.

"I know our older selves have asked us to protect this world, but I can't help but feel there is someone else behind all of this."

Meanwhile, in a dark location, someone was observing over the city through a large window.

"So they finally made it after all. I knew attracting that Eggman character from the other universe would work like a charm. Now I will begin the greatest hunt in my life. Hunting three new heroes." the figure said as he looked at three blank mounts with each of the teams names on it.
132122221211212.title: That night...

1321222212112121.content:
That morning, Espio woke up to a knocking in the other room. He carefully entered the lair and found that the knocking was coming from a video screen. It was a short, slightly plump, man with a long mustache and impressive muscles knocking on the front door of the abandoned house above them.

"Who is this guy?" curious, Espio asked himself. he found an intercom button and pressed it before answering, "Can I help you, stranger?"

The man looked right into the camera that was in the peep hole of the front door. "It's a me, Mario!" in a pleasant tone, the man said. "I am glad to see I am not too late."

"Too late?" confused, Espio thought. then he realized that the man, Mario must have him confused for the three who had lived there before their arrival.

"I have the life renewal mushroom you and your friends needed." holding up a strange green mushroom, Mario said. "Let me in so I can help you and the others be well again."

What is Espio to do...?
1321222212112121.title: Its a me, Mario!

13212222121121212.content:
"Could you give us a moment, Mr. Mario?"

"Of-a course."

Espio then went over to Vector's and Charmy's rooms and woke them up.

"Why did you wake us up?" Charmy said.

"Seriously. I was dreaming about having a wife made of money."

The two just stared at Vector.

"Don't give me that look! Now what is it?"

"I'm afraid one of our alternates past friends have arrived to see them."

"Well, go up and tell him the truth." Vector said.

"I suppose that is best. I'll go and get him."

Espio then headed for the front door and opened it to see Mario.

"Espio? You look-a so young. What is-a going on?"

"Please come in. There's something you should know."
13212222121121212.title: Go face him.

132122221211212121.content:
"I'm a too late!" slamming his fist onto a table, Mario cried. "Curse you, Hacker!"

"Who is this Hacker?" raising an eyebrow, Espio asked.

"He's the one who a mortally wounded Espio-Nage, Charmy-Chan, and Vector-V!" mournfully angry, Mario replied. "They saved me from death when I fell into their world. I returned to my world to get what we call a Level Up mushroom to revive them!"

"Only this Hacker slowed you down." guessing correctly, Charmy said.

Mario nodded. "I ask you to help me stop this new villain before he targets a someone else."

Vector nodded. "If he's the one who killed the old group then I'm in!" serious, he said.

"Me too!" confidently, Charmy said.

"Rodger that." serious, Espio added. "We are all in."

Mario nodded. "Thank you, my a new friends." grateful, he said. "I will call my a brother, Luigi and we will get this a Hacker but good!"

Elsewhere, in an unknown location, a dark figure picked up a telephone and dialed a number. "Metal Sonic, I have a... proposition to offer you."

"I'm listening..." came a robotic response.

Where shall this continue?...
132122221211212121.title: continue

1321222212112121212.content:
Continuing with that phone call, the villain continued to speak to the machine.

"Listen. I have some interesting news for you. The alternate dimensional duplicates of Vector, Charmy and Espio have arrived to our dimension. I would like you to go after them."

"An interesting proposal. I wonder how they would fare against me?"

"We won't know till we find out. Now what would you like in return?"

"I will let you know that at a future date and time. I will accept the offer."

"Perfect. But please bring them here alive."

"Yes, sir."

He then hung the phone back up and flew off into the sky.
1321222212112121212.title: A dark meeting.

13212222121121212121.content:
"Do you or Luigi know of the villains, Dr Robotnik or Metal Sonic?" worried, Charmy asked.

"We a know Robotik." angry, Mario replied. "He's the stupid idiot who a let Hacker in!" he then huffed. "I'll give him a super hammer on the head when we finally meet!"

"The question is why did he let this Hacker in?" mussing, Espio asked. "What could he have possibly gained from working with such a person?"

"Hacker a promised him access to worlds with weapons and a treasures beyond his a dreams." frustrated, Mario replied. "He got them too but Hacker wants it all so..."

"Its only a matter of time before he turns on Robotnik and takes him down as well." catching on, Vector said. he shook his head. "What a complete idiot!"

"Robotik is no doubt forming an army with his newly acquired wealth and other world weapons." thoughtfully, Espio said. "We will need weapons to match them."

"That would be a good plan, Espio." said a familiar voice. all turned to see Metal Sonic as he said, "If you had any time to gather them together."

"We'll make a some time!" came another voice.

Metal Sonic turned to face Luigi who fired a strange gun at him. Metal Sonic was not fast enough to react and found himself completely frozen in place as Luigi then threw him through a pipe. "That will a buy us some time but we must a hurry!" quickly, he said.

Mario smiled at his brother. "We a need weapons from all the other worlds we had a visited to help a save everyone from this a Hacker." patting Luigi's shoulder, he said. "I'll a take Espio, to our world, you take a Charmy and Vector to a Sonic. He will a help us."

Luigi nodded. "Lets a go!"
13212222121121212121.title: Worlds collide.

132122221211212121211.content:
"Exactly how do we get to your world?" curious, Espio asked.

"It's a simple." smiling, Mario said. "We use a travel pipe."

"A travel tube?" raising an eyebrow, Espio asked.

Mario motioned for Espio to follow him to the kitchen where he turned to the sink and threw in a strange mushroom before an odd noise was heard. Espio jumped back in surprise when a large pipe quickly rose from the sink. "That's a travel pipe." smiling, Mario said. "Let's a go!"

With that, he jumped into the tube and vanished with a strange sound coming from the pipe. Espio nodded, having seen stranger things. "Roger." he said, jumping into the pipe.

A moment later, Espio found himself in the Mushroom kingdom where...
132122221211212121211.title: Follow Mario and Espio.

1321222212112121212111.content:
Espio was amazed by all of the colorful scenery the Mushroom Kingdom had around it.

"This is a strange and bizarre world." Espio commented.

"You get-a use to it."

"Mario!" shouted a strange creature with a mushroom cap as it ran up to him.

"What is-a wrong Toad?"

"It's terrible. You need to come with me."

"Why? What's-a wrong?"
1321222212112121212111.title: All was normal.

13212222121121212121111.content:
"Again!?" angry, Mario asked. "Why can't that a Koopa get a hint!?!"

"It wasn't Koopa!" panicked, Toad said. "It was some Warrio!"

"Why would a Warrio take the princess?" confused, Mario asked.

"We can ask this Warrio character when we find him." serious, Espio said. "Any ides where he might have taken her?"

"Warrio a tokk her to his a castle." firmly, Mario said. "Only its a not easy to a get there." he sighed. "I know you have your a own problems but will you a help me save the princess?"

Espio nodded. "I'd be honored."

"Then let's a go!"
13212222121121212121111.title: The princess has been kidnapped

132122221211212121211112.content:
Back to Vector and Charmy, they emerged from the pipe to find a group of humanoid animals standing around a table with serious looks on their faces. "We haven't seen anything from Robotnik in a while." worried, a pink hedgehog girl said. "What could he be planning, Sonic?"

"Nothing good, I'll bet." serious, a blue hedgehog boy replied. "Don't worry, Amy. Whatever it is, we'll be ready to stop him."

"He's a in another world." startling everyone, Luigi said.

"Luigi!" smiling, Sonic said. he came over in a blur. "What about Robitnik?"

"He's teamed up with some creep named Hacker." chiming in, Charmy said. "They are stealing weapons and power up items from several worlds to build an army to conquer everything."

"He's already killed our counterparts in one world." angry, Vector said. "We aim to stop them cold!" he then whispered to Charmy, "The pay for this will be icing on the cake."

"If Robotnik is involved in this, it won't be good for any of us later." a dark hedgehog said. "Some of us should go and take both of them down."

"I'll go with you guys." offering his hand, Sonic said. he turned to the dark hedgehog. "Shadow, can you watch over things here?"

"No." firmly, Shadow replied. "You need to stay here in case Robotnik and this Hacker character attack this world." he sighed. "I will go with your team but understand, Vector... this is a fight for our worlds, not a paycheck."

"You heard that, huh?" blushing slightly, Vector asked. his eyes narrowed. "I know that!"

"Enough, both of you!" stepping in a bat like girl shouted. "I'm going along too!"

"Easy, Rogue." serious, Shadow said. "I'm just making sure we're all on the same page."

"We'll need some weapons and power ups this world has to offer to fight anything they may have stolen or anyone they may have recruited from here." turning to Shadow, Charmy said. "Are there any you can spare us?"

Shadow turned to Sonic and smiled. "I think we can give you a few toys." grinning, Sonic said.
132122221211212121211112.title: Back to Vector and Charmy.

1321222212112121212111121.content:
Author's Note: The power up items below are in italics so to be easier to find if one needs to look back at what the team has to work with on their mission in later chapters. Please bookmark this chapter for easier reference.

******************************************************
"The first thing you will need are some power ups." serious, Rogue said. "It's a good thing I stashed such items for such an emergency."

"What do you have, Rogue?" curious, Shadow asked.

"First, we have a Bounce Bracelet." holding up a golden bracelet, Rogue replied. "It will allow you to jump really high for a short while."

"I have a sack that will hold a lot of items." said Vector. "We can store the power ups in that."

Rogue nodded. "Good idea." she said. "Let Shadow carry it, though. He knows more about these items than you; we don't want anyone to use the wrong item at the wrong time."

Reluctantly, Vector handed Shadow the sack and Rogue handed over the bracelet. "Next is a bazooka." serious, she said. "This will destroy any metal boxes Robotnik may throw in your way."

"Good idea." said Shadow, adding the weapon to the sack. "What else do you have?"

"Well, Hammer Gloves that work like the bazooka but at close range." handing over a pair of glowing boxing gloves, Rogue replied. "Also... your Air shoes." she gave a nervous giggle. "Sorry."

"So that's where they disappeared to." with a half grin, Shadow said. "They increase my speed."

Rogue blushed slightly then handed over a set of Pink Nails. "I know they are not exactly your color." smiling, she said. "Still, they will help you dig underground in case there is no other way around an obstacle or trap."

"We a have a few tricks as well." smiling, Luigi said.

"Like what?" curious, Shadow asked.

"We have a Super Mushroom." serious, Luigi replied. "It a makes us a super big so to fight better."

"Cool." grinning, Vector said. "That may come in handy."

"We a also have a Fire Flower and an Ice Flower that allows us to throw fire balls or ice balls for a short time." holding up a small red and blue flower, Luigi continued. "They both pack a mean punch so be a careful."

"Understood." adding the items to the sack, Shadow said.

"Don't forget the Power Rings." speaking up Rogue said. "They will boost your energy."

Shadow nodded and took a number of rings from her before adding them to the sack. "What else can we work with, Luigi?"

"The last thing I have is a Super Star." holding up a glowing star, Luigi said. "It will make you a very invincible but only for a short time."

"Okay, we'll only use that if there is no other way." adding the item to the sack, he said. "Anyone else want to add anything?"

No one answered and Shadow closed the sack before handing it back to Vector. "I can't be weighed down in case I need to use my speed." serious, he said. "I am trusting you hold on to that sack."

"Do you think that's wise?" wincing, Rogue asked. "After all, he's..."

"A lot like you." smirking, Shadow interrupted. "I learned to trust you, didn't I?" he then smirked, adding, "Think you can keep an eye on him?"

Rogue returned his smirk. "I think I can manage."

"Then we are off to find Robotnik and this Hacker." serious, Shadow said. "If anyone else wants to join us on this quest, speak now."
1321222212112121212111121.title: Power Ups.

choices: A Mermaid's Tail by Hawkeye Pierce
14.content: Here in else, you have the option of crossing this team over with three of my favorite stories. Now which story will you select?
14.title: else

info.brief_description: Your favorite detectives crossover into different genres.
info.description:
Team Chaotix from the sonic series will be crossing over into different medias and it is up to you to figure out what they do when they get there.
The main characters are Vector the crocodile(power), Charmy the bee(flight), and Espio the chameleon(speed). The reaccuring villains are Dr. Eggman and Metal Sonic
rules
no killing, unless its a villain except Dr.Eggman
no sex
no gore(but you can mention blood)
That is all so have fun and add as much as you can.
